entry.summary: Ripple 首席执行官 Brad Garlinghouse 透露 Ripple 对 FTX 存在一些风险敞口，此前租赁给 FTX 的 XRP 大约有 1000 多万美元。该部分资金仅占公司流动资产的 1% 左右，对其业务没有太大影响。希望可以通过破产程序收回部分或全部资金。（The Crypto Basic） https://thecryptobasic.com/2023/01/19/brad-garlinghouse-reveals-ripple-had-inconsequential-ftx-exposure-of-10m-in-xrp/

entry.summary: 基于区块链的债务提供商 Obligate 完成 400 万美元种子扩展轮融资， Circle Ventures 参投，Obligate 的种子轮融资总额超过 850 万美元。资金将用于扩大其债务平台，该平台将于下个月在 Polygon 上线。Obligate 旨在允许公司发行链上债券和商业票据，以在 DeFi 环境中从投资者处获得资金（CoinDesk）

entry.title: RT Willy Woo: LastPass has some answering to do. It was breached in Aug saying it was a source code leak. They now reveal the attackers gained access ...
entry.summary: RT Willy Woo LastPass has some answering to do. It was breached in Aug saying it was a source code leak. They now reveal the attackers gained access to users vaults, unencrypted URLs and billing names, addresses, and IP addresses. They have had 3 months to brute force your master password.
